Normally, the explanations only last for 2 to 3 minutes, but the learning process can be much longer. Our coaches are there to assist you, so don't hesitate to ask for their help. (Tipping the Maniax® staff is entirely at your discretion.)

Depending on the # of players.

Events

*Taxes not included
2:30 to 3 Hours

12 players minimum

A minimum of 12 players is required for an event reservation. If you arrive with fewer than twelve people, you will still need to pay for the minimum of 12 people.

8 Types of Maniax® axes

(Ninja, Mini-Tomahawk, Maniax®, Official, Viking, Hybrid, Tomahawk, and The Big Bertha)
Professional instructor included
(training duration of 2 to 3 minutes).

1 à 3 players per target

Depending on the # of players.

Example: 2 people on 2 targets or 3 people on 2 targets or 5 people on 3 targets, 10 people on 5 targets.

Not valid during busy periods.
Single or double elimination tournament.

Scoring for each match

A competition can easily last up to two hours (depending on the group size). Keeping track of the scores can then become a challenging task and spoil the participants' fun.

In the event package, it's your Maniax® host-coach who will take care of all the logistics of the competition: organization and scoring.

You'll feel like you're in an official axe-throwing competition!

Professional commentator with microphone and tournament officiating.

The host-coach is essential for the smooth running of a group activity. He/She will keep your event lively and well-organized while entertaining you.

Accompanied by a Maniax® commentator, each group will have a unique and personalized experience.

Souvenir photo

It's time for the group photo. This is essential to keep a memory of the great moments spent at Maniax® and to share your experience on social media.
